author: wsjcom
title: Wisconsin Girl in Slender Man Stabbing Sentenced to Mental Facility
text:
WAUKESHA, Wis.—A Wisconsin girl who stabbed a classmate in an attack inspired by the fictional horror character Slender Man was sentenced to 40 years in a mental hospital Thursday.
Judge Michael Bohren discounted Morgan Geyser’s youth—she was 12 years old at the time of the 2014 attack—and granted the maximum penalty sought by prosecutors. Ms. Geyser had pleaded guilty to attempted first-degree intentional homicide in October 2017.
...
